extensionAttribute.description: This extension attribute template will verify that root login over SSH is disabled.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh desiredResult="PermitRootLogin no" result=`cat /private/etc/sshd_config | grep -w "$desiredResult" | tail -1` if [ "$result" == "$desiredResult" ]; then echo "<result>Pass ($result)</result>" else echo "<result>Fail ($result)</result>" fi
